title: S16 Ep18: Supernatural News/Parashare: Dave's Favorite Ghost Story Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: Dave's Favorite Ghost Story Edition
description:
Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News & ParaShare Dave's Favorite Ghost Story Edition

Dave & Tim uncover strange supernatural news from around the world, The Pentagon admits to running tests on UFO debris! The spirits of Europe are lashing out, Science believes they found a portal to the 5th dimension, Scientists also believe Mediums are only hallucinating, Deer are eating people and mating with monkeys and more unusual stories PLUS a Brand New Theater of the Mind, this is Dave's favorite ghost story, shared with you!

Help make a difference and donate to Special Olympics and Dave's son Cliff that takes the Polar Plunge each year to raise money for these awesome competitors.
https://bit.ly/3biTNK2
